metadata.title: CVE-2020-16124 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in the XML RPC library of OpenRobotics ros_comm communications packages allows unauthenticated network traffic to cause unexpected behavior. This issue affects: OpenRobotics ros_comm communications packages Noetic and prior versions. Fixed in https://github.com/ros/ros_comm/pull/2065.

criterions.comment: ros-ros-comm package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
